name: BG
description:
The bridge is locked down due to a gas leak. Engineering is welded shut from the inside. The ship is on low power mode and despite all of the signs of life, everyone is gone. You have no memory of who you are, what you are doing, and why you are alone on such a large ship. Discover the dreaded tale of BG-19 in the game BG. BG is an exploration based interactive narrative where players discover what happened to the crew of the failed voyage by finding fragments of recordings spread out through the ship.

BG was created by Teresa Lim, Sahil Bajaj, and Jessica “Lucan” Burnett using the Unity game engine.
